name: project07_adventure_game
description: This project is not GUI based. It is a console-based game. The video [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EpB9u4ItOYU&t=1s) shows how to develop the game in Java. You will take the requirements of the game from the video and develop the game in TypeScript and Node.js
author: Noman Abid
